list: Implementing search-only address books that query a remote server.

annotations.text: So far, only the API for search-only address books has been implemented.

annotations.note: Ensure all listeners are registered at the top-level and use the synchronous pattern, otherwise the associated address books will be removed on background termination.

annotations.text: The event also fires for each registered listener (for each created read-only address book), when users type something into the mail composer's To: field, or into similar fields like the calendar meeting attendees field. Contacts returned by the listener callback will be added to the autocomplete results in the dropdown of that field.

annotations.note: This parameter may change in future releases of Thunderbird.
Using individual properties is deprecated, use the <var>vCard</var> member instead.
Using individual properties is deprecated, use the <var>vCard</var> member instead.
